useCase.name: View Blog List
useCase.description: Admin requests to view the list of blog posts.

mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view the list of blog posts.
List Blogs View sends the request to Blog Controller.
Blog Controller retrieves the list of blog posts from Blog Model.
Blog Model returns the list of blog posts to Blog Controller.
Blog Controller sends the list of blog posts results to List Blogs View.
List Blogs View displays the list of blog posts to Admin.
